name: Greenhouse Group
tag_list: online-marketing, digital-agency, media-buying, media-optimization, creatives, software-development, social, automated-trading, automated-trading-technologies
overview:
Greenhouse Group invests in companies that operate in the digital playground.

Based in The Netherlands, Greenhouse Group holds 5 majority stakes in:

1) Blue Mango demonstrates that the combination of knowledge, skill and dedication ensures that brands are more strongly profiled and better adapted online. Not one-size-fits-all but made-to-measure and craftsmanship within every discipline of the online marketing mix. Thus Blue Mango works, interactively, for a limited group of clients for whom online is a truly strategic channel.

2) Fresh Fruit is a flexible online marketing agency. Our team of online specialists helps clients with the setup, management and expansion of their online marketing and sales activities. Optimizing your digital media budgets is our focus, both on-site as well as across advertising channels: search, premium display, Real-time Bidding (RTB) and Facebook (FBx and direct).

3) SourceRepublic is a full service SEO agency. SourceRepublic has a strong focus on handling complex, international & multilingual cases on a variety of platforms. An experienced team of hands-on experts make, manage and execute your strategy. All to make your customers find you, wherever they are.

4) FlxOne develops new technologies and tools for automated trading platforms that give control over online advertising back to the marketers. FlxOne is an international trendsetter with products like FlxPxl and FlxAds. The future of online advertising is developed here.

5) Blossom is a creative bureau with social media as its beating heart. Blossom helps brands with their social media strategy, social activation campaigns, community management, influence marketing and social advertising. For every brand that does not want to throw itself into the social side but want chiefly to build an effective lasting dialogue with concrete results.
